name: Pong! (mitsukez)
description:
A pong clone i made using SDL2

The first player to reach 7 points win the game

Controls :

Spacebar  : Insert a coin

W/S              : Player 1 movement (Z/S for azerty keyboards)

Up/Down : Player 2 movement

Source Code available on GitHub : https://github.com/MitsukeZ/Pong-
